name: Super Heroes Jam
description:
Even super heroes can enjoy a casual game of B-Ball every once in a while.

A casual physics-based multiplayer sports game with very simple controls for 2 or 4 players.

Uses WSAD controls for player 1, arrows for player 2, HJKU for player3 and NUMPAD 4,5,6,8 for player 4.

4Player mode is still untested, so only click if you are brave enough ;)

Made in 72 hours for GDL March Madness jam

Songs: Funkorama by MacLeod and Welcome by Roccow
